direction.raw_text: I'm very interested in your story "Middle Children." Some people applaud, but it trickles off before it gets started.

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well I was very interested in exploring a father-daughter relationship. While he clings desperately to her, suffocates her really, he also silently resents the responsibility of parenthood.

direction.raw_text: Right, that's true.   That's true.

Although he said he worked for an independent organization who Whirlpool subcontracts. I think he was retarded. There was an anger in him and suddenly I became afraid for my life. direction.raw_text: They make your face look too wide. Claude removes them and puts them back in the bag.

direction.raw_text: See you soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye, sweety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say, you'll see me "soon."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're acting like a baby. She backs away -- CLAUDE Don't see Dick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry. I don't think he wants to see me anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, Margot. Promise me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hesitates) Don't call me that. Claude doesn't move. Margot points at the bus and mouths "Go". She turns in the other direction. Claude, frustrated and anxious approaches the vehicle.
direction.name: direction
